languages.text: "О, шерин. Несколькими словами вам удалось заставить мое сердце трепетать подобно певчей птице, угодившей в силок умелого охотника. Неужели вам со мной весело? Возможно, вы даже считаете меня... забавной? Всякая девушка мечтает услышать, что из нее выйдет славная игрушка и достойное развлечение". {n}Джай добавляет в голос ровно столько сарказма, чтобы вы его заметили. И столько же шутливой иронии в манящий изгиб улыбки.{/n}

"Oh, shereen. With a few words you have managed to make my heart flutter like a songbird caught in the snare of a skilled hunter. You enjoy being with me? Perhaps you even find me... amusing? Every girl dreams of hearing that she will make a fine toy and a worthy diversion." {n}Jae injects just enough sarcasm into her voice for you to notice, and just enough playful irony into the enticing curve of her smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "О, шерин. Несколькими словами вам удалось заставить мое сердце трепетать подобно певчей птице, угодившей в силок умелого охотника. Неужели вам со мной весело? Возможно, вы даже считаете меня... забавной? Всякая девушка мечтает услышать, что из нее выйдет славная игрушка и достойное развлечение". {n}Джай добавляет в голос ровно столько сарказма, чтобы вы его заметили. И столько же шутливой иронии в манящий изгиб улыбки.{/n}

Perhaps you even find me... amusing? Every girl dreams of hearing that she will make a fine toy and a worthy diversion." {n}Jae injects just enough sarcasm into her voice for you to notice, and just enough playful irony into the enticing curve of her smile.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Ah, shereen. Con solo unas palabras ha hecho que mi corazón tiemble como un ave cantora atrapada en la trampa de un{mf||a} cazador{mf||a} expert{mf|o|a}. ¿Disfruta de mi compañía? Tal vez me considera incluso... ¿divertida? Toda chica sueña con escuchar que es un buen juguete y una diversión adecuada». {n}Jae añade suficiente sarcasmo en su voz para que te des cuenta y suficiente ironía juguetona en las curvas de su sonrisa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen. With a few words you have managed to make my heart flutter like a songbird caught in the snare of a skilled hunter. You enjoy being with me? Perhaps you even find me... amusing? Every girl dreams of hearing that she will make a fine toy and a worthy diversion." {n}Jae injects just enough sarcasm into her voice for you to notice, and just enough playful irony into the enticing curve of her smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ah, shereen. Con solo unas palabras ha hecho que mi corazón tiemble como un ave cantora atrapada en la trampa de un{mf||a} cazador{mf||a} expert{mf|o|a}. ¿Disfruta de mi compañía? Tal vez me considera incluso... ¿divertida? Toda chica sueña con escuchar que es un buen juguete y una diversión adecuada». {n}Jae añade suficiente sarcasmo en su voz para que te des cuenta y suficiente ironía juguetona en las curvas de su sonrisa.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “亲爱的，你三言两语就能让我心潮澎湃。我的心脏在高鸣着，就像被熟练的猎人捕获的鸣鸟一般。你喜欢和我在一起？或许你甚至觉得我……很有趣？每个女孩可是都梦想着听到‘她会是个不错的玩物，是个不错的消遣’这种话呢。”{n}婕伊的声音中带着足够的讽刺意味，让你足以察觉到她的讥讽，迷人的微笑中又带着足够的俏皮意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen. With a few words you have managed to make my heart flutter like a songbird caught in the snare of a skilled hunter. You enjoy being with me? Perhaps you even find me... amusing? Every girl dreams of hearing that she will make a fine toy and a worthy diversion." {n}Jae injects just enough sarcasm into her voice for you to notice, and just enough playful irony into the enticing curve of her smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的，你三言两语就能让我心潮澎湃。我的心脏在高鸣着，就像被熟练的猎人捕获的鸣鸟一般。你喜欢和我在一起？或许你甚至觉得我……很有趣？每个女孩可是都梦想着听到‘她会是个不错的玩物，是个不错的消遣’这种话呢。”{n}婕伊的声音中带着足够的讽刺意味，让你足以察觉到她的讥讽，迷人的微笑中又带着足够的俏皮意味。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、シャリーン。そのたった二言三言だけで、あたしの心は熟練したハンターの罠にかかった鳴き鳥みたいにトキメクいているわ。あたしといると楽しいって？あたしのこと…面白いと思ってる？女はみんな、楽しいおもちゃとか、いい気晴らしになるとか言われると嬉しいものなのよ」{n}ジェイは、ほんの少しの皮肉をその言葉に込める。その魅力的な笑顔の端にもまた、イタズラっぽい皮肉がこもっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen. With a few words you have managed to make my heart flutter like a songbird caught in the snare of a skilled hunter. You enjoy being with me? Perhaps you even find me... amusing? Every girl dreams of hearing that she will make a fine toy and a worthy diversion." {n}Jae injects just enough sarcasm into her voice for you to notice, and just enough playful irony into the enticing curve of her smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、シャリーン。そのたった二言三言だけで、あたしの心は熟練したハンターの罠にかかった鳴き鳥みたいにトキメクいているわ。あたしといると楽しいって？あたしのこと…面白いと思ってる？女はみんな、楽しいおもちゃとか、いい気晴らしになるとか言われると嬉しいものなのよ」{n}ジェイは、ほんの少しの皮肉をその言葉に込める。その魅力的な笑顔の端にもまた、イタズラっぽい皮肉がこもっている。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Oh, shereen... Quelques mots de votre part, et mon cœur s'emballe comme un rossignol pris au piège d'un prédateur implacable. Vous dites apprécier ma compagnie ? Peut-être même me trouvez-vous... distrayante ? Toutes les jeunes filles rêvent de s'entendre dire qu'elles feraient un joli jouet et un divertissement de bon aloi. » {n}Jae insuffle à ses propos la juste dose de sarcasme pour faire passer le message, et à son sourire ce qu'il faut d'ironie espiègle pour arrondir les angles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen. With a few words you have managed to make my heart flutter like a songbird caught in the snare of a skilled hunter. You enjoy being with me? Perhaps you even find me... amusing? Every girl dreams of hearing that she will make a fine toy and a worthy diversion." {n}Jae injects just enough sarcasm into her voice for you to notice, and just enough playful irony into the enticing curve of her smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oh, shereen... Quelques mots de votre part, et mon cœur s'emballe comme un rossignol pris au piège d'un prédateur implacable. Vous dites apprécier ma compagnie ? Peut-être même me trouvez-vous... distrayante ? Toutes les jeunes filles rêvent de s'entendre dire qu'elles feraient un joli jouet et un divertissement de bon aloi. » {n}Jae insuffle à ses propos la juste dose de sarcasme pour faire passer le message, et à son sourire ce qu'il faut d'ironie espiègle pour arrondir les angles.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ach, Shereen. Mit wenigen Worten ist es Euch gelungen, mein Herz flattern zu lassen wie einen Singvogel, der einem fähigen Jäger in die Falle gegangen ist. Ihr seid gerne mit mir zusammen? Ihr findet mich vielleicht sogar ... amüsant? Jedes Mädchen träumt doch davon, zu hören, dass es ein gutes Spielzeug und eine würdige Ablenkung abgeben würde." {n}Jae legt gerade genug Sarkasmus in ihre Stimme, dass du ihn bemerkst, und gerade genug verspielte Ironie in die verführerische Kurve ihres Lächelns.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen. With a few words you have managed to make my heart flutter like a songbird caught in the snare of a skilled hunter. You enjoy being with me? Perhaps you even find me... amusing? Every girl dreams of hearing that she will make a fine toy and a worthy diversion." {n}Jae injects just enough sarcasm into her voice for you to notice, and just enough playful irony into the enticing curve of her smile.{/n}

Jedes Mädchen träumt doch davon, zu hören, dass es ein gutes Spielzeug und eine würdige Ablenkung abgeben würde." {n}Jae legt gerade genug Sarkasmus in ihre Stimme, dass du ihn bemerkst, und gerade genug verspielte Ironie in die verführerische Kurve ihres Lächelns.{/n}

languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen. With a few words you have managed to make my heart flutter like a songbird caught in the snare of a skilled hunter. You enjoy being with me? Perhaps you even find me... amusing? Every girl dreams of hearing that she will make a fine toy and a worthy diversion." {n}Jae injects just enough sarcasm into her voice for you to notice, and just enough playful irony into the enticing curve of her smile.{/n}

languages.text: "Ah şirinim. Birkaç sözle kalbimin yetenekli bir avcının tuzağına yakalanmış bir kuş gibi çırpınmasına sebep oldun. Benimle olmaktan keyif mi alıyorsun? Belki de beni eğlenceli bile buluyorsundur? Güzel bir oyuncak ve zaman geçirilmeye değer bir eğlence aracı olduğunu duymak, her genç kızın hayalidir." {n}Jae, mesajı alabilmen için sesine bir miktar kinaye aşılayıp gülümsemesinin kenarına muzip, ironik ve işveli bir kıvrım konduruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen. With a few words you have managed to make my heart flutter like a songbird caught in the snare of a skilled hunter. You enjoy being with me? Perhaps you even find me... amusing? Every girl dreams of hearing that she will make a fine toy and a worthy diversion." {n}Jae injects just enough sarcasm into her voice for you to notice, and just enough playful irony into the enticing curve of her smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ah şirinim. Sadece birkaç sözcüğün, kalbimin yetenekli bir avcının tuzağına yakalanmış bir kuş gibi çırpınması için yeterli oldu. Benimle olmaktan keyif mi alıyorsun? Belki de beni eğlenceli bile buluyorsundur? Güzel bir oyuncak ve zaman geçirilmeye değer bir eğlence aracı olduğunu duymak her genç kızın hayalidir." {n}Jae mesajı alabilmen için sesine bir miktar kinaye aşılıyor ve gülümsemesinin kenarına muzip, ironik ve işveli bir kıvrım konduruyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
